sentences.sentence: I want nothing but raiment and daily bread.
There'd be a merry contrast betwixt my glory and my raiment!
sentences.translation: 我的荣誉和我的衣着之间的对比是令人愉快的！

sentences.sentence: This is he who had never known aught but rags for raiment, kicks for comfort, and offal for diet!
sentences.translation: 这就是他，他一辈子只有破衣烂衫可以穿，只被脚踢，只有残羹冷炙可以吃！
